input.string: SELECT id, email, name, create_at FROM user WHERE id = ${id}
SELECT COUNT(email) as count FROM user WHERE email = '${email}'
UPDATE user SET name = '${name}', email = '${email}', update_at = now() WHERE id = '${id}'
INSERT INTO collection (name, emoji, user_id, create_at) VALUES ('${name}', '${emoji}', '${user_id}', now())
UPDATE collection SET name = '${name}', emoji = '${emoji}' WHERE user_id = ${user_id} AND id = ${collection_id}
DELETE FROM collection WHERE user_id = ${user_id} AND id = ${collection_id}
DELETE FROM todo WHERE user_id = ${user_id} AND collection_id = ${collection_id}
INSERT INTO todo (title, collection_id, user_id, create_at) VALUES ('${title}', '${collection_id}', '${user_id}', now())
DELETE FROM todo WHERE user_id = ${user_id} AND id = ${todo_id}
UPDATE todo SET title = '${title}', description = '${description}', complete = '${complete}' WHERE user_id = ${user_id} AND id = ${todo_id}
SELECT * FROM collection WHERE user_id = ${user_id} AND id = ${collection_id}
SELECT * FROM todo WHERE user_id = ${user_id} AND collection_id =  ${collection_id}
